widget.title: Level Up
widget.description: Take meaningful actions to drive your business forward and unlock new opportunities.

common.learnMoreHelpCenter: Learn more about it in our Help Center

physical.title: Physical Products
physical.description: Add physical products by entering details like name, description, and price. Customers can browse and buy directly from your store.

digital.title: Digital Goods
digital.description: Sell digital products like eBooks, software, or music. Upload files, set prices, and allow instant downloads after purchase.

onDemand.title: Production-on-Demand Items
onDemand.description: Offer customizable products like t-shirts or mugs that are produced only when ordered, handled by your print-on-demand partner.

storefront.title: Customize Your Storefront Template
storefront.description: Stand out by customizing your store's design. Select a template, adjust colors, fonts, and layout to match your brand.

main.title: Join the Affiliate Market
main.description: Expand your reach by joining the affiliate market. Promote other stores' products for a commission or list your own for affiliates to sell.

firstOrder.title: Receive Your First Order
firstOrder.description: Manage your store's activity and orders. From payment to delivery, we guide you through every step to help grow your business.

productLink.title: Product Link
productLink.description: Generate a payment link for any product, simplifying the checkout process and bypassing the storefront.

productTile.title: Product Tile
productTile.description: Create a customizable product tile for your website. Configure details and upload images to match your brand.

socialTile.title: Social Tile
socialTile.description: Share products on Twitter with an embeddable tile that allows customers to view details and purchase directly.
